name: media.convert_eps_to_svg
description: Convert an EPS (Encapsulated PostScript) file to SVG using Inkscape CLI.

eps_path.description: Path to the input EPS file.

output_path.description: Path for the output SVG file. Defaults to the input path with a .svg extension.
Resolved absolute path to the written SVG file.

file_size_bytes.description: Size of the output SVG file in bytes.

inkscape_stderr.description: Inkscape stderr output (warnings, info, or empty).

errors.description: Execution failed (Inkscape missing, file not found, conversion error, etc.).

side_effects: Executes Inkscape CLI; writes an SVG file to disk. Overwrites the output file if it already exists.
